title: Will the Star News print edition ever expand the TV listings to a full page so we can get the schedule for all the Wilmington channels like Me Tv, Bounce, This, and the Cape Fear CW?  (The current listings include the secondary channels for UNC TV but not for WWAY, WECT, WILM, or WSFX.)
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=20889
